title: Patient Care Practical Competency Enhancement: Audio-Based Elementary Mathematics Foundational Skills Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve addition and subtraction problems within 100 with 80% accuracy by listening to audio explanations
Learners can represent verbally presented simple word math problems through a three-step reasoning procedure
Learners can confirm concept comprehension by scoring over 70 points on weekly quizzes (audio assessments)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
